data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Hadjer-Lamis, Chad today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hadjer-Lamis, Chad
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 40,979 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hadjer-Lamis, Chad so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Hadjer-Lamis.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Baggara, Shuwa Arab people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help every believer in Hadjer-Lamis, Chad be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Hadjer-Lamis that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hadjer-Lamis, Chad has a population of 563,000.

We estimate Hadjer-Lamis has 40,979 people who might know Jesus, 102,794 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 419,227 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hadjer-Lamis, Chad. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
